Key Match Events: Pete Alonso hit a three-run homer in the ninth inning to stun the Brewers
Post-Match Reflections: Mets manager Carlos Mendoza emphasized the importance of having fun and believing in themselves
Pete Alonso was celebrated by his teammates as the hero of the game
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Mets won the wild-card series in a thrilling Game 3
The Mets will face the Philadelphia Phillies in the National League Division Series
